hero.core_tension: Choose targeted cohort sends that preserve margin and relevance versus a tempting blanket sitewide discount.
hero.setting: Compact planning room split between a store floor window and a studio desk with screens showing creative variants.
hero.persona: Head of Retail (operator) making the go/no-go call
hero.action: Selecting three pragmatic cohorts and assigning one tailored creative and offer per cohort on a tablet.
hero.urgency_symbol: A wall calendar with Nov 20â€“Dec 04 highlighted and a single sticky note reading Send Now.
props: Tablet showing cohort list (high-intent, recent buyers, loyalty members)
One-page measurement checklist listing cohort conversion, unsubscribe, event CPA
hero.lighting: Polished editorial lighting with confident highlights and clear negative space on the tablet and checklist.
hero.alt: Head of Retail selecting three cohort-targeted offers for an early-holiday test

signal_map.structure: Concentric rings (measurement spine) with a central node for the campaign and radial arcs for channels.
elements: Tokens labeled early_window_share and footfall_lift on separate rings
Annotated event_cpa ceiling marker on the outer ring
Paths from partner placements to in-store touchpoints
signal_map.motion: Flow runs inward from partner-paid reach and store media into cohort segments, with thicker arcs where CPA stays below 0.8x.
signal_map.palette: Neutral paper textures, steel gray lines, and two accent colors for lift (teal) and risk (muted red).
signal_map.alt: Head of Partnerships inspecting a signal map linking early-window share to footfall uplift and CPA

case_studies.scene: Small creative studio where an Email Lead and a Designer preview three product-specific creatives tied to cohorts.
case_studies.moment: The Email Lead marks one creative as the tailored test and pins the blanket 20% control aside.
case_studies.persona: Email Lead (operator) executing the 'Relevance trumps volume' cohort play
props: Pinned creative artboards labeled by cohort
Tablet showing live conversion_rate and unsubscribe rate metrics
case_studies.lighting: Clean editorial sidelight emphasizing textures of paper and screens, with soft shadow to isolate the action.
case_studies.alt: Email Lead launching cohort-targeted creative to compare tailored offers vs a 20% control

case_studies.scene: Partnership ops desk with a retailer and a partner rep mapping placements onto a weekend store schedule.
case_studies.moment: They agree a partner-funded promo and place QR code panels tied to in-store studio activations.
case_studies.persona: Head of Partnerships (operator) activating a partner-funded promo
props: Map of store zones with QR code placements
Dashboard printout forecasting partner_value and expected qr_redemption
case_studies.lighting: Polished highlights on co-branding; broad negative space to read the map and dashboard easily.
case_studies.alt: Head of Partnerships activating a partner-funded promo to drive QR redemptions in the early window
